title: 2004 Recommendation of Removal Under 8 U.S.C. § 1227(a)(4)(C) (U.S. Department of State)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. A copy of the recommendation by Secretary of State Colin Powell to Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security Tom Ridge on April 24, 2004, that an African national (the "African National") be removed under 8 U.S.C. § 1227(a)(4)(C) (the "Recommendation"). The Recommendation is referenced in a May 9, 2025, filing by the U.S. Department of Justice in Khalil v. Joyce, et al., Civ. Act. No. 25-1963 (MEF) (MAH) (D.N.J.), available at https://storage.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.njd.564334/gov.uscourts.njd.564334.241.0.pdf.

2. Any communications between the Department of State and the Department of Homeland Security concerning either (a) the Recommendation; or (b) the African National.

3. Any internal communications, reports, or other records referencing either (a) the Recommendation; or (b) the African National.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
